full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO TRAKSHAD 'KHOR BCAS DRAG TU BSKUL BA RNGAMS PA'I SGRA DBYANGS DANG DE NYID KYI MNGA' GSOL BCAS BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO LTAR BCAS 'GRO BA'I SKYABS MGON MTSUNGS ZLA MA MCHIS PA, RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG PO NAS, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YONGS 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA'I MGON PO TRAKSHAD KYI GTOR CHOG GI SKONG LTA BUR, ,BSKUL DANG MNGA' GSOL BCAS 'DRI DGOS ZHES, ,CHAB SHOG GI LAM NAS BSKUL MA GNANG BA GUS PAS NOD DE, ,KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I MGON PO RJE DZNY'A NA'I MTSAN CAN SOGS DAM PA DU MA'I BKA' DRIN LAS MGON PO 'DI NYID KYI RJES GNANG SGRUB THABS KYI LUNG SOGS KUN MKHYEN T'A RA NA THA'I YIG CHA LTAR THOB PA'I, ^SH'AKYA DGE SLONG RIGS PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG GIS RANG GIS BSAM GTAN GYI LANG BUR SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, ,YE SHES MGON POS 'PHRIN LAS GA-YEL MED MDZAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG
